metadata.title: CVE-2017-16854 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) through 3.3.20, 4 through 4.0.26, 5through 5.0.24, and 6 through 6.0.1, an attacker who is logged in as acustomer can use the ticket search form to disclose internal articleinformation of their customer tickets.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16854` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.5-1
otrs2 - 6.0.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.5-1').
